module.name: content
module.title: Home
module.html:
We are Horowitz Law Group - a New York based law firm, specializing in Labor, Construction and Litigation. We are high-quality, result-oriented legal practice with extensive experience and a proven track-record of success.

Our guarantee is impeccable, diligent legal representation on both state and federal level. Horowitz Law attorneys comprehensively review every case to realize our client's objectives at competitive rates.
